releaseNotes:
We have had some lovely feedback and suggestions from our recent update. We've refined the layout and added some additional features:

- New Audio Tracks
3 new Binaural Beats hypnosis & meditation sessions.

- New Free eBooks
2 Free eBooks including The Ultimate Guide to Self-Hypnosis & About the Solfeggio Scale.

- Download All
You can now download all purchases together using the new "Download All" option in the Help menu.

- New Design
We have refined the new user interface and merged the Store and Library sections into one easy to navigate page. 

- Updated Breathe Feature
We had several requests to add an audio prompt to the breathe feature. You can now listen with your eyes closed.

We also hope that you enjoy the other features that we have added recently including the Categories Menu, Favourites, Breathe feature.

We have also fixed the early bugs in this new version.

We sincerely hope you enjoy the new features and new tracks in this update.

As always, if you run into any issues, let us know at sales@hypnosisaudio.com
description:
Relax & Sleep Well is a hypnosis and meditation app by Glenn Harrold, a highly experienced hypnotherapist of over 20 years. All recordings are high quality, professional studio productions, as Glenn is also a musician who knows his way around a recording studio. Each track has been lovingly recorded using the best microphones and recording equipment available. 

No sign up required, the app simply features 4 free hypnotherapy and meditation recordings and over 80 in-app purchase options covering insomnia, stress, anxiety, mindfulness, sleep, weight-loss, confidence, self-esteem, the solfeggio frequencies, binaural beats, spiritual healing, phobias, addictions and much more. 

Relax & Sleep Well also includes a playlist feature, a manage storage feature to help control the size of the app, a breathe feature, and an easy to navigate interface with detailed descriptions for each title. All support and help issues are replied to within 24 hours.

Relax & Sleep Well has helped well over 3 million people to meditate and sleep well every night!

# Number 1 Grossing Lifestyle App in New Zealand
# Number 1 Grossing Lifestyle App in Ireland
# Number 1 Grossing Lifestyle App in South Africa
# Number 1 Grossing Lifestyle App in Denmark
# Number 1 Grossing Lifestyle App in Israel
# Number 1 Grossing Lifestyle App in Peru
# Number 1 Grossing Lifestyle App in Norway
# Number 1 Grossing Lifestyle App in Jordan
### And many more……………..

Download Now to find out why this app has been number 1 in over 50 countries!

The free tracks include Relax & Sleep Well, which is a full 29-minute hypnotherapy session that will take you on a relaxing journey into the deepest levels of self-hypnosis. The subtle soundscapes supporting Glenn’s calming voice will help you connect with a profound feeling of relaxation and mindfulness. It will also help you to alleviate stress and anxiety, overcome insomnia and encourage healthy sleep patterns. 

The next free track is a 30-minute lite version of the stunning 639 Hz Solfeggio Sonic Meditation, which is based upon the ancient Solfeggio musical scale. When you experience this powerful healing meditation it will give you an idea of what the full range of Solfeggio Meditation titles sound like. Overcome insomnia stress and sleep well with this dreamy, relaxing meditation recording.

The latest free track is a lite version of the Mindfulness Meditation for Releasing Anxiety. This 25 minute meditation will put you in a very present state and help you to feel mindful.

This app also includes two free eBooks: The Solfeggio Scale eBook and Glenn's guide to Self-Hypnosis eBook, which is an in depth guide showing you how to use self-hypnosis to help you in many areas of your life. 

A typical Glenn Harrold hypnosis or meditation recording features dreamy background sound effects recorded in specific keys and frequencies to help guide you into a deep state of mental and physical relaxation. 

All of Glenn's Hypnosis and Meditation Recordings Feature:

* The very latest hypnotherapy, mindfulness and healing meditation techniques combined with state-of-the-art recording technology.

* Glenn's highly acclaimed hypnotic vocal techniques guiding you into a deeply relaxed state.

* Background sound effects recorded in specific musical keys and frequencies to compliment the hypnotic suggestions and deepen the relaxation effect.

* Stereo-echoed affirmations, which pan from ear-to-ear across the stereo range - a deeply relaxing and unique effect.

Glenn is one of the world's most successful hypnotherapists. His recordings have sold over 10 million and he is a published author of 8 self-help health books. Glenn has 20 years of hypnotherapy experience and has worked with many celebrity clients.

Relax & Sleep Well Free by Glenn Harrold was placed 1st in Healthline’s list of the Best Insomnia Apps in 2018!  "Healthline’s editors carefully selected each winner based on quality and usability."
